==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Kinne:''' Hmm? Brave outlander, would you like to take part in this [[Warrior's Challenge]]? I've just adjusted the drop intervals on mine...
:'''Kinne:''' As to what intervals I'm talking about... You'll find out once we start. What say you? Want to give it try?
:{{DIcon|Warrior's Challenge}} Let's begin!
:;(Opens Warrior's Challenge interface)
:{{DIcon}} Give me a moment to prep...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Available during the Warrior's Challenge''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Kinne:''' Make sure you grab all those Challenge Coins that come flowing in with the current. You'll score more points that way!
----
;(Upon starting the challenge)
:'''Kinne:''' Are you ready? The challenge is about to begin, you've gotta catch the Challenge Coins that flow down!

;(Upon reaching the second half of the challenge)
:'''Kinne:''' Hey hey, not bad! But now the coins are going to get a lot faster!
{{Dialogue End}}
